statements: UPDATE transactions_table SET transaction_amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE AccountUpdates SET current_balance = current_balance - 500, total_transactions = total_transactions + 1 WHERE account_id = 5678
